attributes.action: urge the Premier League not to go ahead with its proposals to host competitive matches in Foreign countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Premier League wants to host competitive premier League matches in Foreign countries.  This has caused outrage amongst fans and would make English football at the highest level into a marketing exercise completley devoid of the little soul and community spirit it has left.
The undersigned urge the Prime Minister to intervene and stop the Premier League from scheduling these matches.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
